sn37.1:4.1: “Mendicants, when a female has five factors she is extremely undesirable to a man.
sn37.1:4.3: She’s not attractive, wealthy, or ethical; she’s idle, and she doesn’t beget children.
sn37.1:4.4: When a female has these five factors she is extremely undesirable to a man.
sn37.1:4.5: When a female has five factors she is extremely desirable to a man.
sn37.1:4.7: She’s attractive, wealthy, and ethical; she’s skillful and tireless, and she begets children.
sn37.1:4.8: When a female has these five factors she is extremely desirable to a man.”
